Title: To The Last Man.
Subtitle: A Novel Of The First World War.
Authors: Jeff Shaara.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=YLTBBV6s5zQC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: In the spring of 1918, when a neutral America is goaded into World War I, the world waits to see if the tide of war can be turned with the renewed spirit and strength of the untested American Expeditionary Force, lead by General John "Blackjack" Pershing.
